Review Name: Super! Review Description: This is really best ac. Consume 3 unit in 10 hour use at 27 temp. Cooling is very good for room size 12*12. Installation is big hectic process specially in this lockdown situation and huge demand of ac in season, also installation become very expensive when outdoor unit is required to install in far away and no nearby electricity point available.installation guy are just skilled labour and it feels uncomfortable to let them entry in house in such pandemic situation.buying ac in these period must be avoided because you never now who is coming to install it.service of flipkart and this lg ac is superb.
